css: body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 1.6; color: #000; padding: 0; margin: 0; } h1 { font-size: 20pt; margin-top: 24px; margin-bottom: 12px; padding-bottom: 6px; border-bottom: 2px solid #ccc; page-break-after: avoid; } h2 { font-size: 16pt; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-bottom: 4px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; page-break-after: avoid; } h3 { font-size: 14pt; margin-top: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; page-break-after: avoid; } h4 { font-size: 12pt; margin-top: 14px; margin-bottom: 6px; font-weight: bold; page-break-after: avoid; } table { border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; margin: 16px 0; page-break-inside: avoid; } th, td { border: 1px solid #ccc; padding: 8px; text-align: left; } th { background-color: #f0f0f0; font-weight: bold; } code { background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 2px 6px; border: 1px solid #ddd; font-family: Courier, monospace; font-size: 10pt; } pre { background-color: #f8f8f8; border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 12px; overflow-x: auto; page-break-inside: avoid; margin: 16px 0; } pre code { background-color: transparent; padding: 0; border: none; } blockquote { border-left: 4px solid #0066cc; margin: 16px 0; padding: 8px 16px; background-color: #e6f2ff; page-break-inside: avoid; } blockquote p { margin: 8px 0; } p strong { font-weight: bold; } ul, ol { page-break-inside: avoid; margin: 12px 0; } li { margin: 4px 0; } a { color: #0066cc; text-decoration: none; } hr { border: none; border-top: 1px solid #ccc; margin: 24px 0; }
